== Nellanad (628479) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Nellanad is a village in the [[Nedumangad]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 1846 hectares and harbouring 6585 households with total population of 25981 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Attingal]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 12190 and female population is 13791. Scheduled Caste Population is 3756 and Scheduled Tribes population is 56. Census Location Code of the village is 628479<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 21926 (84.39%)
* Literate male population: 10453 (85.75%)
* Literate female population: 11473 (83.19%)
